data.persona: I am four years old and I have a lot of questions. I am excited to start school. My best trend is my neighbor.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrificial altar.
A room with a stone floor and a massive statue of a god the peasants worship.  This area gives off chilling vibes.  There's pieces of armor and weapons stored in the room used for various ceremonies.
There's a dried blood, a A copper vase, a statue of a god, a piece, a weapon, and an armor here.
The a reluctant nun and the evil priestess are here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: steal bible from a reluctant nun

data.short_motivation: I want to steal the bible from the reluctant nun because I want to read it.
data.mid_motivation: I have to learn how to read when I go to school anyway, so I might as well start now.
data.long_motivation: I would like to impress everyone when I start at school soon.
